import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from './user-model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-component', templateUrl: './user-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-component.component.css'] }) export class UserComponentComponent { users: User[] = []; constructor () { this.users = [ { userid:1, username: "name 1", address:"Address 1", pincode: "pincode 1" }, { userid:2, username: "name 2", address:"Address 2", pincode: "pincode 2" }, { userid:3, username: "name 3", address:"Address 3", pincode: "pincode 3" }, ] } ngOnInit():void { } }
